Articles.Content:
So when I start up ksp it loads super slow like normal, but once it gets to "Loading asset bundle Definitions" it just stays there suck, while Ksp isn't frozen still doing those things like "locating jeb".

I am using 64bit windows 7

the x64 version and x32 version both have the issue but 1.0.5 works fine.

I have the same issue; google search came up with the idea of removing an eVGA application, but I don't have any installed. KSP just never gets anywhere.

 

What did you find to fix yours?

 

EDIT:  NVM, I found the culprit. Needed to move the KSP folder to another HDD location and allow full read-write access. Never had THAT crop up before!

Edited April 21, 2016 by Xorth Tanovar
Found the answer.
